name: High Railer
description:
"There’s trouble aboard the Dymaxion Express Company! Their trademark high speed sky transports that seamlessly speed to their destinations have found themselves under attack and wildly off the rails! Unless you can hold on tight and fix things up the Sky train in time, the damage will reach the power engines and cause it to lose track - Permanently!"

How to Play:

Arrow Keys to Move

S to grab a hold of train

Tap the Spacebar to repair train

P to Pause

R to Restart (if you get tossed off)

+Tips from the Makers!+

  • The train works like a mechanical bull, when it starts changing directions it knocks people off, so grab on when you can - especially at the Start of the levels!
  • Find the source of the smoke to make repairs, when you hear chimes as you top space, you've found the right area!
  • Some cars will start damaged at the top AND bottom sides, so jump carefully!

This is a submission for the 72 hour  Game Gen Mega Jam  following the theme of "Don't stop Moving!"  using the Lospec palette, Witching Hour!   With Programming by the Fantastic Masterh84 and Artwork by yours truly!
